document_data.image: Court of the White Bull CS-map.png
document_data.caption: A depiction of Gaustus Street on a ca. 1357 DR map of Waterdeep
document_data.name: Gaustus Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaustus Street''' was a street of hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This street stretched from north to south, curving off of the [[Wall Way]] and terminating at the [[Court of the White Bull]].

Notable Locations.Old Guildhall: the guildhall of the [[Cellarers' & Plumbers' Guild]].
